alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 02 at 9:12PM PDT until April 03 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with damaging gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Mountains and Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 5 AM Monday to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 5 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains
